issues.description: The problem statement text specifies that the addGuestStudents method should take a String parameter, but the UML diagram in the same problem statement and the implementation in the solution repository both use an int parameter. This inconsistency within the problem statement and across artifacts could confuse students about the correct parameter type to use, potentially leading them to implement the method incorrectly based on the textual description.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text on line 50 to specify 'addGuestStudents(int)' to match the UML diagram and the solution implementation, ensuring all artifacts consistently describe the method as taking an int parameter.
